titleStmt.title: Right honourable, the Lord hath this day, here at Philiphauch ... appeared gloriously for his people
titleStmt.author: Argyll, Archibald Campbell, Earl of, 1629-1685

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: Argyle. Crawfurd. Lindsay. William Scot. Balcleuch. Lauderdaill. Lanerick. Yester. Bargeine. J. Rutherfurd. Foresster. To the right honourable the Commissioners of the kingdom of Scotland, residing at London.
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
